sentence: Why did the chicken run into a well? because it didnt see that well.
explanation: the word well refers to a water well
first_new_sentence: The villagers dug a deep well to ensure a constant water supply.
second_new_sentence: I hope you are feeling well after your illness.

sentence: Whats the difference between a chick pea and a walnut? Ive never had a walnut on my face.
explanation: the word face refers to the front part of the head
first_new_sentence: She washed her face with a special cleanser every morning.
second_new_sentence: The clock has a beautiful face that glows at night.

sentence: Why did the picture go to jail? because it was framed.
explanation: the word framed refers to a structure that holds a picture
first_new_sentence: The artist spent hours creating a beautifully framed painting for the gallery.
second_new_sentence: The suspect was framed for a crime he didnt commit.

sentence: What do you call a cold Jewish person? iceberg.
explanation: the word iceberg refers to a large floating mass of ice
first_new_sentence: The ship navigated carefully around the massive iceberg in the ocean.
second_new_sentence: His emotions were an iceberg, cold and hidden beneath a composed exterior.

sentence: How does shrek describe his sex with fiona? medi-ogre
explanation: the word ogre refers to a large mythical creature
first_new_sentence: The story featured a terrifying ogre who captured the princess.
second_new_sentence: He felt like an ogre in his own life, misunderstood and alone due to his size.
